Title: I'll Light a Candle for You Every Day
Writer: John Wells (developer), Paul Abbott (creator), Nancy Pimental, LaToya Morgan (staff writer)
Actors: William H. Macy, Emmy Rossum, Justin Chatwin, Ethan Cutkosky
Plot: Fiona reconnects with her married high school crush, while Frank contemplates marriage with Dottie. But Debbie, in light of Harry's demise, becomes obsessed with death.
